dmca.title: [ABUSE] Copyright infringement]
dmca.body:
nc 

-----Original Message-----
From: R Phillips [mailto:legal@damprabbit.com] 
Sent: Sunday, March 13, 2005 3:05 AM
To: copyright@theplanet.com
Cc: Ken Berman
Subject: Re: [Fwd: Re: [ABUSE] Copyright infringement]

To whom it may concern, In regards to the matters quoted below I have
attached two screen shots showing your clients webpage clearly showing our
copyright on your clients webpage and a second screen shot showing how many
time it has been downloaded thorough their webpage.

We have recently been able to prevent your client from using our content but
please note that on the webpage at
http://www.jengajam.com/r/ing-amazing-juggler you will still see the HTML
code attempting to use our content.

<frameset rows="75,*" cols="*"><frame name="frame1" frameborder="0"
src="http://www.jengajam.com/index.php?act=frame&id=13020" scrolling="no"
noresize="noresize" />
<frame name="frame2" frameborder="0"
src="http://www.juggler.com/video/clips/billW.html" scrolling="auto"
noresize="noresize" /></frameset>
<noframes>JengaJam.com >> @%#&$ing  Amazing Juggler (wmv) - </noframes>

We feel this is a clear violation of the DMCA of 1988 and appreciate your
help in this area in ending this violation and the many other violations on
Jengajam.com.

Sincerely
R Phillips


> -----BEGIN PGP SIGNED MESSAGE-----
> Hash: SHA1
> 
> Your email is being sent to our copyright-related legal counsel at the 
> address of copyright@theplanet.com for consideration.
> 
> 
> - -------- Original Message --------
> Subject: Re: [ABUSE] Copyright infringement
> Date: Wed, 09 Mar 2005 01:00:22 -0800
> From: RPhillips@damprabbit.com <legal@damprabbit.com>
> To: The Planet Policy Enforcement <abuse@theplanet.com>,    Ken Berman
> <ken@hollowstone.com>
> 
> 3/4/05 11:33 AM, The Planet Policy Enforcement at abuse@theplanet.com
wrote:
> 
>> 
>> 
>> 
>> Your email is being sent to our copyright-related legal counsel at 
>> the address copyright@theplanet.com for consideration.
>> 
>> --
>> Thanks,
>> 
>> Policy Enforcement
>> The Planet Internet Services, Inc.
>> http://www.theplanet.com/aup/
>> 
>> Thank you very much, please see if you can stop him as soon as you 
>> can, I'm not having any luck blocking him from my server and I have 
>> been charged $500 for bandwidth overages because of this movies 
>> theft. I'm still racking up charges in this area and would be most 
>> appreciative if this can stop immediately.
>> 
>> Thanks
>> 
>> R Phillips
>> 
>> 
>> 
>> 
>> This is a forwarded message
>> From: RPhillips@damprabbit.com <legal@damprabbit.com>
>> To: <abuse@theplanet.com>
>> Date: Thursday, March 3, 2005, 7:47:07 PM
>> Subject: [ABUSE] Copyright infringement
>> 
>> ===8<==============Original message text=============== Hello, 
>> apparently a server you are running is stealing our copyrighted 
>> material and costing us hundreds of dollars in server fees.
>> 
>> You can see our copyright clearly displayed on this page.
>> 
>> http://www.jengajam.com/r/ing-amazing-juggler
>> 
>> The site jengajam.com seems to be bringing in advertising revenue 
>> based on our content which they display in their frame with their name.
>> 
>> Please take the necessary steps to end your contribution in this 
>> blatant violation.
>> 
>> Thank you
>> R. Phillips
>> 
>> 
>> 
>> ===8<===========End of original message text===========
> 
> - --
> Thanks,
> 
> Policy Enforcement
> THe Planet Internet Services, LLC
> http://www.theplanet.com/aup/
